recent_news.title: Webinar Recap: Payments on Solana - A Production-Ready Ecosystem
recent_news.summary: Recap of the "Payments on Solana" webinar featuring Sheraz Shere and Ilan Gitter, covering why Visa, PayPal, and Worldpay are building on Solana across treasury management, remittances, neobanking, payouts, and merchant settlement.

recent_news.title: Matrixdock Brings XAUm to Solana, Expanding Institutional-Grade Tokenized Gold Access
recent_news.summary: Matrixdock deploys XAUm, Asia's largest tokenized gold product, on Solana, enabling institutional-grade tokenized gold with near-instant settlement and DeFi integration.

recent_news.title: Solana Network Upgrades
recent_news.summary: A regularly-updated page giving the status of upgrades to the Solana network: Alpenglow, 100M CUs, SIMD 123, and more.

recent_news.title: WisdomTree Expands Tokenization Ecosystem to Solana
recent_news.summary: Today, WisdomTree brings its full suite of regulated tokenized funds to Solana. Both institutional and retail investors can now access money market, equities, fixed income, alternatives, and asset allocation via WisdomTree Connect and WisdomTree Prime.

recent_news.title: The Solana Foundation Delegation Program
recent_news.summary: A Case Study on Validator Bootstrapping, Incentive Design, and Exit
